statements: DELETE FROM employee_training_materials WHERE employee_id = 101 AND material_id = 201;
DELETE FROM employee_training_materials WHERE completed = true AND progress >= 50;
DELETE FROM employee_training_materials WHERE employee_id = 100 AND completed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM employee_training_materials WHERE material_id IN (SELECT material_id FROM employee_training_materials WHERE progress < 50);
DELETE FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials WHERE employee_id = 101
DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE progress_id = 201
DELETE FROM RemoteEmployeeTrainingMaterials WHERE employee_id = 100 AND material_type = 'Presentation';
DELETE FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE completion_status = true AND progress_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_training_progress WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM training_materials WHERE id = 3;
DELETE FROM employee_training_progress WHERE material_id = 5 AND progress < 0.5;
DELETE FROM TrainingMaterials WHERE material_id = 1;
DELETE FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE progress_id = 3;
DELETE FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE employee_id = 100 AND progress_status = 'Completed';
DELETE FROM TrainingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video' AND material_url = 'https://example.com/video1';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101;
DELETE FROM employee_training_materials WHERE material_name = 'Java Basics';
DELETE FROM employee_training_progress WHERE progress_id = 1;
DELETE FROM employee_training_materials WHERE material_name = 'Training Material 1';
